title: 3 Easy Ways to Cancel a YouTube Premium Membership

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com/paid_memberships in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com/paid_memberships in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address or username and password to do so now. [1] X Research source You'll see your active Premium subscription underneath the Memberships header. Use this method to cancel a YouTube Premium membership or free trial.

steps.title: Click Manage membership.
steps.content: Click Manage membership . This will be to the right of your current membership. The membership box will expand.

steps.title: Click Deactivate.
steps.content: Click Deactivate . You'll see this next to your next billing period date. If you're using a free trial, you'll see "Free trial ends [date]".

steps.title: Click Continue to cancel.
steps.content: Click Continue to cancel . This is the option on the left. If you want to pause your membership, click Pause instead . You can pause for up to 6 months and resume at any time.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . You'll see a list of Premium benefits that will end once you cancel.

steps.title: Select a reason for your cancelling.
steps.content: Select a reason for your cancelling. Choose from the list of options, or select Don't want to answer .

steps.title: Click Cancel Premium.
steps.content: Click Cancel Premium . Your YouTube Premium membership will end. If you ended your membership before your next billing date, you'll see the last day of your subscription underneath Premium . To restart a YouTube Premium membership, click Manage Membership â†’ Renew .

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store app.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store app. This looks like a multi-colored "play" icon. [2] X Research source Use this method to cancel YouTube Premium if you initially subscribed through the Google Play Store . Alternatively, you can also change your payment method .

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This will be in the top-right corner. If you have multiple Google accounts connected, select the correct account from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Payments & subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Payments & subscriptions . You can find this underneath Library .

steps.title: Tap Subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Subscriptions . This will be underneath Payment methods .

steps.title: Tap YouTube Premium.
steps.content: Tap YouTube Premium . The apps will be listed in alphabetical order. Find YouTube Premium underneath the Active header.

steps.title: Tap Cancel subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel subscription . This will be at the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Select a reason and tap Continue.
steps.content: Select a reason and tap Continue . Google will ask why you want to cancel the subscription. Select a reason, or tap Decline to answer .

steps.title: Tap Cancel subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel subscription . Your YouTube Premium subscription will be cancelled. You will still have access to your subscription until the date listed. Afterwards, your account will return to its basic version.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. [3] X Research source Use this method to cancel YouTube Premium if you initially subscribed through the YouTube iOS app. If you are billed through Google, you must use a computer to cancel your membership.

steps.title: Tap your Apple ID.
steps.content: Tap your Apple ID. You can find this at the very top. Make sure you're signed into the correct Apple ID .

steps.title: Tap Subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Subscriptions . This will be underneath Payment & Shipping . You'll see a list of all your active subscriptions associated with your Apple ID.

steps.title: Tap YouTube Premium.
steps.content: Tap YouTube Premium . The list will be in alphabetical order, separated into Active and Inactive categories.

steps.title: Tap Cancel Subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel Subscription . This will be in red font, at the very bottom.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . Your YouTube Premium subscription will be cancelled. You will still have access to your subscription until the date listed. Afterwards, your account will return to its basic version.
